text: Pharyngeal Arches continued… Lecturer: T. Tshabalala Office no. 2P22, Second floor, Medical school Pharyngeal arches continued… This lecture covers Pharyngeal arches embryology II and III on your timetable . Make sure you listen to the first lecture before you engage this one.
